Directions: In an ungreased 3-qt. baking dish, combine all ingredients. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 60-70 minutes or until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. Discard bay leaf before serving.
Ingredients: 1 (19 ounce) can garbanzo beans (chickpeas), rinsed and drained
1 (15.5 ounce) can great northern beans, rinsed and drained
1 (15 ounce) can butter beans, rinsed and drained
